Kyurem (TCG)

From Bulbapedia, the community-driven Pokémon encyclopedia.
Jump to navigationJump to search
← #0645: Landorus
Pokémon
#0647: Keldeo →

Kyurem has been featured on 28 different cards since it debuted in the Noble Victories expansion of the Pokémon Trading Card Game. Kyurem cards are normally Dragon-type or Water-type Basic Pokémon. As a Dragon-type, their attacks normally have costs including Energy, with the second type of Energy depending on the form depicted:

  • for its normal form.
  • for Black Kyurem.
  • for White Kyurem.

List of Pokémon cards featuring Kyurem

Kyurem
Cards listed with a blue background are only legal to use in the current Expanded format.
Cards listed with a green background are legal to use in both the current Standard and Expanded formats.
